WeBWorK::DB::Utils - useful utilities for the database modules.

public method WeBWorK::DB::Utils::global2user ( $$   ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in global2user($$): 8
sub global2user($$) {
    my ($userRecordClass, $GlobalRecord) = @_;
    my $UserRecord = $userRecordClass->new();
    foreach my $field ($GlobalRecord->FIELDS()) {
        $UserRecord->$field($GlobalRecord->$field());
    }
    return $UserRecord;
}

# Number of lines of code in grok_setID_from_vsetID_sql($): 4
sub grok_setID_from_vsetID_sql($) {
    my ($field) = @_;
    return "SUBSTRING($field,1,INSTR($field,',v')-1)";
}
public method WeBWorK::DB::Utils::grok_versionID_from_vsetID_sql ( $   ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in grok_versionID_from_vsetID_sql($): 5
sub grok_versionID_from_vsetID_sql($) {
    my ($field) = @_;
    # the "+0" casts the resulting value as a number
    return "(SUBSTRING($field,INSTR($field,',v')+2)+0)";
}
public method WeBWorK::DB::Utils::grok_vsetID ( $   ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in grok_vsetID($): 5
sub grok_vsetID($) {
    my ($vsetID) = @_;
    my ($setID, $versionID) = $vsetID =~ /([^,]+)(?:,v(.*))?/;
    return $setID, $versionID;
}
public method WeBWorK::DB::Utils::initializeUserProblem (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in initializeUserProblem: 12
sub initializeUserProblem {
    my ($userProblem, $seed) = @_;
    $seed = int rand 5000 unless defined $seed;
    $userProblem->status(0.0);
    $userProblem->attempted(0);
    $userProblem->num_correct(0);
    $userProblem->num_incorrect(0);
    $userProblem->problem_seed($seed);
    $userProblem->sub_status(0.0);

    return $userProblem;
}
public method WeBWorK::DB::Utils::make_vsetID ( $$   ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in make_vsetID($$): 4
sub make_vsetID($$) {
    my ($setID, $versionID) = @_;
    return "$setID,v$versionID";
}
public method WeBWorK::DB::Utils::make_vsetID_sql (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in make_vsetID_sql: 4
sub make_vsetID_sql {
    my ($setID, $versionID) = @_;
    return "CONCAT($setID,',v',$versionID)";
}
public method WeBWorK::DB::Utils::user2global ( $$   )

# Number of lines of code in user2global($$): 8
sub user2global($$) {
    my ($globalRecordClass, $UserRecord) = @_;
    my $GlobalRecord = $globalRecordClass->new();
    foreach my $field ($GlobalRecord->FIELDS()) {
        $GlobalRecord->$field($UserRecord->$field());
    }
    return $GlobalRecord;
}
